ios.subtitle: Roll the Dice, Pass Go & Win

name: THE GAME OF LIFE: Road Trip

editorialNotes.standard: Form smart alliances to keep the spice flowing in this superb digital re-imagining of the popular board game.

name: Ticket to Ride The Board Game

editorialNotes.standard: Prehistoric times were pretty roughand this fine digital adaptation of the popular survival board game doesnt hold back.
Cool reaction emoji! Strategy-smashing Nope cards! The fur truly flies in this slick adaptation of the zany card game.
Scurry to victory with mountains of cheese by stealing from friends and evading the mousetrap in this lively digital re-imagining of the popular board game.

Whats made OLO game one of our longtime multiplayer favourites? The way it perfectly captures the friendly fun of real-world shuffleboard and air hockey. Virtually anyone can jump into a match (locally or online) and have an amazing time flicking discs into the target zone for pointsand slyly knocking an opponents discs away to lower their score. Elegant and irresistible, Senneps all-ages masterpiece lets up to four players enjoy games that can be as casual or hardcore as everyone wants them to be.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Switch on the laser pointer! Scoop the litter! Rub the belly of the all-seeing Pig-a-Corn! This mobile version of the insanely irreverent card game brings the fatal felines to our devices, along with a few purr-fect new twists. The hysterical illustrations by Matthew Inman (creator of The Oatmeal) spring to life with animation and soundand a meter that tracks the chance of drawing an exploding kitten makes the game even more hilariously tense. Played face-to-face with friends or online against strangers, its surprisingly strategic and cat-astrophically fun.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: Tsuro - The Game of the Path

editorialNotes.standard: This gorgeous digital board game couldnt be any simpler to learn, but true mastery lies at the end of a long and winding path. As fans of Tsuros tabletop incarnation, we love how faithfullyand beautifullythe experience is re-created here. App-exclusive ways to play add new layers of depth, letting us get lost for hours among these tricky, twisty trails.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
